subject: Tracy Smith: The Video Everyone Is Talking About
body:
CBSNews.com












  Home | U.S. | World | Politics | SciTech | Health | Entertainment | Business | Opinion | Sports | Blogs | Interactives | Video 

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 






May 4, 2007
 
Hi, everyone,
Have you seen the David Hasselhoff 
      video?
Sadly, I'm not talking about 
      a "Baywatch" DVD. This one isn't so easy to watch: 
      it's a home video of 
      the "Baywatch" and "Knight Rider" star in 
      which he appears to be flat-out drunk. The timing is interesting: 
      Hasselhoff is in the middle of a contentious divorce and custody 
      battle. "Entertainment 
      Tonight" is covering the story, and I'm sure we'll hear more 
      in the days ahead.
If that video isn't 
      enough to scare people off drinking too much this weekend, in this 
      morning's Health Watch a substance abuse expert told us about a study that 
      shows drinking 
      a lot of alcohol could actually shrink your brain.
And if you want 
      to meet a guy who's just high 
      on life, Dave was live 
      from Royal Caribbean's new cruise 
      ship, The Liberty of the Seas, this morning. He went surfing 
      in the ship's wave pool -- well, "surfing" 
      might be an overstatement. But he sure was fun to 
      watch.
Join 
      us tomorrow for to learn how to make 
      a complete Cinco de Mayo party for 
      under $40; take a look at some of the new high-tech wrinkle cures; hear about a fascinating new 
      book, "The Myth of Happiness," and, 
      to top it all off,  take 
      in a performance by Carly Simon! And 
      on Monday morning, we'll be giving a big check to the winners of "The 
      Amazing Race: All Stars" (the show's 
      finale is Sunday night.)
Take care, 


Tracy SmithEarlyShow@cbs.com
